meanings: the principle[policy] of having affairs run by a select few

vlive.korean: '우최아'의 정예멤버를 소개합니다. I introduce the elite members of "W.S.I." 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : [Full] 'IDOL RADIO' ep#2. 우리는 최강 아이돌 (with B.A.P영재, 권현빈)
vlive.english: I introduce the elite members of "W.S.I."

vlive.korean: [또 정예멤버 타령] 정예의 멤버 우리... 알지? [There I go again about the elite members] We are the elite members... You know, right? 듣기 View video EMMA BEAUTY : [화보장인엠마] 화보 LOOK .5 가을빛 데일리 메이크업 Autumn+VLOG 사진촬영 메이크업 팁!
vlive.english: [There I go again about the elite members] We are the elite members... You know, right?

vlive.korean: 그러니까 소수 정예로. A small number of you. 듣기 View video SF9 : 아 새해다 🎉
특수 정예부대 출신이고요. part of the elite unit. 듣기 View video SMTOWN : 현빈X유해진X김주혁X임윤아 <공조> 무비토크 라이브 'Movie Talk Live'
팬 아홉 분과 함께 오늘... -소수정예네. With 9 fans. - A selected few. 듣기 View video Apink : apink's Broadcast (골든티켓 이벤트)

examples.korean: The unit operates with a few good people. 발음듣기 이 부대는 소수 정예로 운영되고 있습니다. Neungyule
examples.english: The unit operates with a few good people. 발음

examples.korean: Our team is made up of a small number of the best players. 발음듣기 우리 팀은 소수 정예로 구성되어 있다 Neungyule
examples.english: Our team is made up of a small number of the best players. 발음

examples.korean: We don't want just anybody; we want a few good men. 발음듣기 우리는 아무나 원하지는 않아요. 소수 정예를 원하죠. Neungyule
examples.english: We don't want just anybody; we want a few good men. 발음

examples.korean: All of the best Korean players are slated for this Korea-Japan match. 발음듣기 이번 한일전에는 한국의 정예 멤버가 총출동한다 Neungyule
examples.english: All of the best Korean players are slated for this Korea-Japan match. 발음

examples.korean: Elite troops used the cover of chaos to attack Roman Catholic churches. 발음듣기 정예 부대는 혼란을 구실 삼아 로마 가톨릭 교회를 공격했다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Elite troops used the cover of chaos to attack Roman Catholic churches. 발음
